text: A city manager is an official appointed as the administrative manager of a city in the council–manager form of city government. Local officials serving in this position are referred to as the chief executive officer (CEO) or chief administrative officer (CAO) in some municipalities. ==Related pages== *Council-manager government == References == ==Further reading== *Kemp, Roger L.
